verses.verse: Joshua <S%H3091><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and they moved <S%H5265><s%> from Shittim, <S%H7851><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> he and all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> They lodged <S%H3885><s%> there before they passed over. <S%H5674><s%>
It happened after <S%H7097><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that the officers <S%H7860><s%> went <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the midst of the camp; <S%H4264><s%>

and they commanded <S%H6680><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "When you see <S%H7200><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> it, <S%H5265><s%> then you shall move from your place, <S%H4725><s%> and follow <S%H1980><s%> it. <S%H310><s%>

Yet there shall be a space <S%H7350><s%> between you and it, <S%H505><s%> about two thousand cubits <S%H520><s%> by measure. <S%H4060><s%> Don't <S%H7126><s%> come near to it, <S%H3045><s%> that you may know the way <S%H1870><s%> by which you must go; <S%H3212><s%> for you have not passed <S%H5674><s%> this way <S%H1870><s%> before. <S%H8543><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves; <S%H4279><s%> for tomorrow Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6381><s%> among you. <S%H7130><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Take up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and pass over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>" They took up <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Today <S%H3117><s%> I will begin <S%H2490><s%> to magnify <S%H1431><s%> you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that as I was with Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so I will be with you.

You shall command <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H935><s%> 'When you come to the brink <S%H7097><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> you shall stand still <S%H5975><s%> in the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>'"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Come here, <S%H5066><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Hereby you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is among <S%H7130><s%> you, <S%H3423><s%> and that he will without fail drive the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> and the Girgashite, <S%H1622><s%> and the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> out <S%H3423><s%> from before you. <S%H6440><s%>
Behold, <S%H727><s%> the ark of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H113><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%> passes over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you into the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
Now therefore take <S%H3947><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%> out of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man. <S%H376><s%>

It shall come to pass, <S%H3709><s%> when the soles of the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> who bear <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of all the earth, <S%H776><s%> rest <S%H5117><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> will be cut off, <S%H3772><s%> even the waters <S%H4325><s%> that come down <S%H3381><s%> from above; <S%H4605><s%> and they shall stand <S%H5975><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> heap. <S%H5067><s%>"

It happened, <S%H5971><s%> when the people moved <S%H5265><s%> from their tents <S%H168><s%> to pass over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> being before <S%H6440><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%>

and when those who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> had come <S%H935><s%> to the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> had dipped <S%H2881><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> (for the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> overflows <S%H4390><s%> all its banks <S%H1415><s%> all the time <S%H3117><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%>),

that the waters <S%H4325><s%> which came down <S%H3381><s%> from above <S%H4605><s%> stood, <S%H5975><s%> and <S%H259><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> heap, <S%H5067><s%> a great <S%H3966><s%> way off, <S%H7368><s%> at Adam, <S%H121><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> that is beside <S%H6654><s%> Zarethan; <S%H6891><s%> and those that went down <S%H3381><s%> toward the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> even the Salt <S%H4417><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> were wholly cut off. <S%H3772><s%> Then the people <S%H5971><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> right against Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

The priests <S%H3548><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> firm <S%H3559><s%> on dry ground <S%H2724><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> and all Israel <S%H3478><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> on dry ground, <S%H2724><s%> until all the nation <S%H1471><s%> had passed <S%H5674><s%> completely <S%H8552><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>
